name: @psf/bch-js
description: A JavaScript library for working with Bitcoin Cash, eCash, and SLP Tokens
author: Chris Troutner <chris.troutner@gmail.com>

scripts.test:integration:nft: export RESTURL=https://bchn.fullstack.cash/v5/ && export IS_USING_FREE_TIER=true && mocha --timeout 30000 -g '#nft1' test/integration/chains/bchn/slp.js
